welcome_message_body: “Welcome to Riverview, where charm and beauty meet! Enjoy our quaint town known for its picturesque river views, friendly locals, and vibrant cultural scene. We invite you to explore and savor all that Riverview has to offer!”

restaurants.address: 18237 Fort St (btwn Sibley & Pennsylvania), Riverview, MI 48193
